name: part_000
file: tmp_【 #ねぽらぼアイドル衣装 】雪花ラミィのアイドル衣装お披露目！【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [VzozxWBBVJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title screen and intro music for Yukihana Lamy's idol costume reveal.
Yukihana Lamy greets the viewers and talks about the costume reveal event.
Lamy performs a magical girl style transformation into her idol costume.
Yukihana Lamy performs 'Suki! Yuki! Honki Magic!' on stage.

subtitles.original: 雪花ラミィ アイドル衣装
subtitles.english: Yukihana Lamy Idol Costume

subtitles.original: いぇーい！みんなー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Everyone!

subtitles.original: こんらみー！
subtitles.english: Kon-Lamy!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ5期生、雪花ラミィでーす！こんらみー！
subtitles.english: I'm Yukihana Lamy, Hololive 5th Gen! Kon-Lamy!

subtitles.original: いや、おまるん、よかったねー！
subtitles.english: Wow, Omarun (Polka) was great!

subtitles.original: すごい可愛かった。もう次はラミィがね、
subtitles.english: She was so cute. Now it's Lamy's turn...

subtitles.original: みんなにお披露目する感じになるので、緊張しておりますが、
subtitles.english: ...to reveal it to everyone, so I'm really nervous, but...

subtitles.original: 今日は #ねぽらぼアイドル衣装 でみんな、いっぱいつぶやいてね！
subtitles.english: Please tweet a lot today with #NePoLaBoIdolCostume!

subtitles.original: ということで、ラミィも、この後、
subtitles.english: So, after this, Lamy is also...

subtitles.original: アイドル衣装に着替えて、1曲、みんなに披露したいと思っております！
subtitles.english: ...going to change into my idol costume and perform a song for you!

subtitles.original: あー緊張するー！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so nervous!

subtitles.original: それでは！お着替えー！
subtitles.english: Well then! Time to change!

subtitles.original: さらん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: それでは、いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Now, here we go!

subtitles.original: あわいホイップしたケーキのような街は
subtitles.english: The town, like a lightly whipped cake,

subtitles.original: すき！ゆき！マジマジマジック！
subtitles.english: Is Love! Snow! Real, Real Magic!

subtitles.original: 空がくれるコンフェッティは
subtitles.english: The confetti given by the sky

subtitles.original: 冬のベスタ　いわば天使の羽よ　わぁ！
subtitles.english: Is Winter's Vesta, or rather, angel's wings! Whoa!

subtitles.original: 好き！雪！本気マジック！ 作詞・作曲：Mitchie M
subtitles.english: Suki! Yuki! Honki Magic! / Lyrics & Composition: Mitchie M

subtitles.original: 白銀の国へ　出かけるの Go-Go-Go
subtitles.english: Setting off to the silver land, Go-Go-Go

subtitles.original: 雪の馬車が　街を駆け　Chu-Chu-Chu
subtitles.english: A snow carriage runs through the town, Chu-Chu-Chu

subtitles.original: 絵本みたいな景色を　君に見せてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you a scene just like a picture book

subtitles.original: 願い込めて　呪文さぁ　唱えて (My Mai!)
subtitles.english: So put your wishes into it and chant the spell (My Mai!)

subtitles.original: A B C D Do-Do Si-Si La-La Si-Si
subtitles.english: A B C D Do-Do Si-Si La-La Si-Si

subtitles.original: マジカル　ミラクル　クルッポ！
subtitles.english: Magical Miracle Kuruppo!

subtitles.original: あわいホイップしたケーキのような街は
subtitles.english: The town, like a lightly whipped cake,

subtitles.original: すき！ゆき！マジマジマジック！
subtitles.english: Is Love! Snow! Real, Real Magic!

subtitles.original: 空がくれるコンフェッティは
subtitles.english: The confetti given by the sky

subtitles.original: 冬のベスタ　いわば天使の羽よ
subtitles.english: Is Winter's Vesta, or rather, angel's wings

subtitles.original: ライトアップしたオーロラ色の街は
subtitles.english: The aurora-colored town lit up

subtitles.original: すき！ゆき！マジマジマジック！
subtitles.english: Is Love! Snow! Real, Real Magic!

subtitles.original: 子供でいられるな　ドリームランド
subtitles.english: Is a dreamland where you can stay a child

subtitles.original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Yukihana Lamy!
subtitles.english: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Yukihana Lamy!

subtitles.original: ずっと冷たい　季節が　Love-Love-Love
subtitles.english: The cold season will always be Love-Love-Love

subtitles.original: アイス魔法も　解けないように　Hyu-Hyu-Hyu
subtitles.english: So that the ice magic won't melt, Hyu-Hyu-Hyu

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままじゃダメなの？ やっぱりドキドキしたいな
subtitles.english: Is it no good to stay like this forever? I still want my heart to throb

subtitles.original: 未来　求め　呪文今　唱えて (Now!)
subtitles.english: Seeking the future, chant the spell now (Now!)

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 4 水・金・地・火・木・土・天・海
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4 Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune

subtitles.original: マジカル　ミラクル　クルッポ！
subtitles.english: Magical Miracle Kuruppo!

subtitles.original: あわほっぷしたウサギのような気分
subtitles.english: Feeling like a bubbly rabbit

subtitles.original: すき！ゆき！マジマジマジック！
subtitles.english: Love! Snow! Real, Real Magic!

subtitles.original: 大地がくれるケーキ皿は
subtitles.english: The cake plate the earth gives us

subtitles.original: 思い通り遊んでいけるよ
subtitles.english: Lets us play however we want

subtitles.original: まぶしい白に染まるハート　君に
subtitles.english: A heart dyed in dazzling white, for you

subtitles.original: すき！ゆき！マジマジマジック！
subtitles.english: Love! Snow! Real, Real Magic!

subtitles.original: 大人のフリなんて　いいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Pretending to be an adult is fine!

subtitles.original: I'm the Lamy-lamy-tan!
subtitles.english: I'm the Lamy-lamy-tan!

subtitles.original: Thank you and welcome-dan!
subtitles.english: Thank you and welcome-dan!

subtitles.original: This is Yukihana Lamy-no!
subtitles.english: This is Yukihana Lamy's!

subtitles.original: なまらファンタスティック！
subtitles.english: Namara fantastic!

subtitles.original: The snow is ミシカル！
subtitles.english: The snow is mythical!

subtitles.original: エクセレント・マジカル！
subtitles.english: Excellent magical!

subtitles.original: I'll take you for it my Lamy! Oh-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: I'll take you for it my Lamy! Oh-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 今日の寒さも忘れるように
subtitles.english: So that you'll forget today's coldness

subtitles.original: 悩みだって　涙だって　凍らせて　消せる魔法よ　わぁ！
subtitles.english: Troubles and tears, this magic will freeze and erase them! Whoa!
